<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Update a notification handler"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/notification-handlers/{notification_handler_id}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Update a notification handler

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"notification_handler_id","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"integer"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"multipart/form-data":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"name":{"type":"string"},"type":{"type":"string","enum":["email","webhook","slack","discord","telegram","microsoft_teams"]},"email":{"type":"string"},"webhook":{"type":"string"},"slack":{"type":"string"},"discord":{"type":"string"},"telegram":{"type":"string"},"telegram_chat_id":{"type":"string"},"is_enabled":{"type":"boolean"}}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Notification handler updated successfully.","content":{"application/json":{"example":{"data":{"id":1}}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
